snippet: A discharge petition would allow supporters of immigration overhaul to circumvent the Republican majority in the House by bringing a measure directly to the House floor, bypassing the committee process.
abstract: Sen Charles E Schumer, Democrat of New York, offers long-shot option to revive moribund effort to overhaul nation's immigration laws; legislative maneuver, known as a discharge petition, would allow supporters of overhauling nation’s immigration laws to circumvent Republican majority in the House by bringing measure directly to House floor, bypassing the regular committee process.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and JONATHAN WEISMAN

lead_paragraph: A discharge petition would allow supporters of immigration overhaul to circumvent the Republican majority in the House by bringing a measure directly to the House floor, bypassing the committee process.

headline.main: Schumer Offers Long-Shot Option to Skirt House G.O.P. on Immigration
headline.print_headline: Schumer Offers Long-Shot Option to Skirt House G.O.P. on Immigration
